Social welfare means that it socially provides a service to keep and to improve quality of a life with minors elderly people disabled people and those who are in poverty or maintains its systems and facilities. Social welfare should be primarily the system above But in order to receive such benefits we need to go through too complicated procedures so people who really need support can t receive benefits under present conditions. Daniel Blake a 59 year old joiner living in Newcastle has had a heart attack at work so he needs social welfare But he can t receive benefits from the government because of its complicated formalities online On such an occasion he helps a single mother Katie and her two children in trouble and starts an warm interaction with t hem. There is a word love your neighbor as yourself in the Bible but anybody can t do it like this Although Daniel himself is in the serious situation he reaches out to Katie and her children Ironically he personally undertakes the role which the government must socially carry out. The situation which surrounds Daniel and Katie becomes worse more and more and they are pushed into increasing poverty However Daniel never loses kindness to Katie and his dignity until the end When I face such a difficult situation can I help others in trouble in front of me. This movie makes me think what the genuine kindness is and my dignity which I don t have to lose is.
